name: ALMANAC Project
body:
### ALMANAC Smart City Enablers
The ALMANAC Smart City Enabler are a set of components for developing IoT applications in a smart city context...
#### On Github
All our Smart City Enablers are published on github under Apache 2.0 
https://github.com/almanacproject
#### On Docker
For your convenience all our Smart City Enablers are freely available at the Docker Hub.

### The ALMANAC Lab
The ALMANAC Lab is a full deployment of the ALMANAC Smart City Enablers which can be used to experiment with IoT in a Smart City context. Use our components when building YOUR IoT solution, here at the ALMANAC-Lab. You can experiment with the OPEN data we are publishing, or add your own. If you prefer, download our platform, and get started with things like storage, messaging, security in just a few seconds. Our components can be used individually, or together as a comprehensive Reliable Smart Secure Internet of Things for Smart Cities platform.

### Authors and Contributors
almanac-project.eu

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
